main: ^Oh nothing much Apple! Just going around helping patch people up.
^Oh? Blue and Lemon got banged up?
^and to be honest I think Blueberry is more interested in examining what I'm doing than the other way around.
^I'm glad you're here to look after them.
^Well what about you Apple? that last fight was tough and if you got bruised up, I'm happy to look at it.

s: ^I'll be honest, they got me pretty good
^They didn't even lay a finger on me

good: ^No shame in that! Besides, this is nothing compared to what King Snail's doctor must be dealing with!
